ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:0.2_0: The monks’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.2_0: At that time there was a handsome and graceful monk called Venerable Nanda, the Buddha’s cousin. He was 7 centimeters shorter than the Buddha,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.3_0: but he wore a robe that was the same size as the Buddha’s.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.4_0: When the senior monks saw him coming,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.6_0: they thought it was the Buddha and got up from their seats.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.7_0: But when he came close, they realized who it was, and they complained and criticized him,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.8_0: “How can Venerable Nanda wear a robe the same size as the Buddha’s?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.9_0: “Is it true, Nanda, that you do this?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.12_0: “... Nanda, how can you do this?
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.13_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.14_0: the Buddha said, “And so, monks, this training rule should be recited like this:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.15.1_0: ‘If a monk has a robe made that is the standard robe measure or larger, it is to be cut down, and he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.16_0: This is the standard robe measure: nine standard handspans long and six wide.’”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.17_0: This is the standard robe measure.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.1.2_0: and you have the same kind of perception ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.1.4_0: ... The monks who have been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of monk is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.1.6_0: nine standard handspans long and six wide.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.1.8_0: If he makes the blanket, or has it made, then for the effort there is an act of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.1.9_0: When she obtains it, it is to be cut down, and she is then to confess an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.1.10.1_0: If she finishes what she began herself, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.1.11_0: If she has others finish what she began herself, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.1.12_0: If she finishes herself what was begun by others, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.1.13_0: If she has others finish what was begun by others, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.1.14_0: If she makes one or has one made for the benefit of someone else, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.1.15_0: If she obtains one that was made by someone else and then uses it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.2.2_0: if she makes it less than the right size;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.2.3_0: if he obtains one made by another that is too large and then cuts it down before using it;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.2.4_0: if she makes a canopy, a floor cover, a cloth screen, a mattress, or a pillow;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.2.7_0: The tenth rule, the training rule on Nanda, is finished.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.2.8_0: The ninth sub-chapter on precious things is finished.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.2.14_0: “Venerables, the ninety-two rules on confession have been recited.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.2.15_0: In regard to this I will ask you:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.2.17_0: A second time I ask the Sangha to answer:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.2.21_0: You will remember it, please remember it; I will remember it thus.’
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.2.23_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession is finished.
